description: A hearty, filling soup packed with veggies, chickpeas, brown rice and osso bucco. Budget-friendly and easy to make, this is the perfect weeknight winter warmer.
keywords: Soup,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Fresh ingredients,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Parsnip,Soy free,Wheat free,Comfort food,Rice,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Farmhouse Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup no added salt tomato paste

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas in a large saucepan with 11/2 litres water. Bring to the boil, cover and cook for 1 minute. Turn off heat. Leave to stand for 1 hour (if leaving for longer, place in fridge).
Drain chickpeas. Add 11/2 litres water. Bring to the boil. Add osso bucco, onion, rosemary, bay leaves and herbs. Cover and simmer gently for 11/2 hours.
Remove and discard the bay leaves. Remove the meat from the bones and set aside.
Add carrot, potato, parsnip, leek, tomatoes, rice and tomato paste. Season with salt. Bring to the boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Return meat to the saucepan. Add broccoli and beans and cook for a further 5 minutes. Serve topped with parsley.
